Key Match Events: Ireland Men scored 96 runs in 16 overs, setting India a target of 98 for victory
India knocked off the target with 8 wickets and 46 deliveries to spare
Mark Adair took the major scalp of Virat Kohli for just one
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the biggest crowd in US cricketing history with 20,604 spectators
The wicket caused problems for batters on both teams
Others: Ireland's next fixture in Group A is against Canada on Friday, 7 June at the same ground
